entry.title: Glee's Heather Morris Caught Up in Nude Photo Leak Scandal?

link.Abstract: Just like us, celebrities take their panties off one leg at a time. They just tend to do it while holding an iPhone or something.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: Did Glee's Heather Morris take a photo of her Brittany? A series of "leaked," NSFW photos thought to have come off the actress' phone hit the web on March 11, 2012.
link.title: Did Glee's Heather Morris take a photo of her Brittany? A series of "leaked," NSFW photos thought to have come off the actress' phone hit the web on March 11, 2012.

entry.title: Lindsay Lohan's Marilyn Monroe Sketch Scrapped by Saturday Night Live

link.Abstract: Lindsay Lohan was reportedly set to star as Marilyn Monroe (again) but Saturday Night Live pulled the sketch last minute.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: According to TMZ, Lohan was set to impersonate her beloved Monroe during her recent appearance on SNL, but her sketch got pulled at the last minute.
link.title: According to TMZ, Lohan was set to impersonate her beloved Monroe during her recent appearance on SNL, but her sketch got pulled at the last minute.

link.Abstract: Watch Jack White bluster through Blunderbuss tracks "Sixteen Saltines" and "Love Interruption."

link.Abstract: Lindsay Lohan says she landed a guest spot on Saturday Night Live after “harassing” the show’s Lorne Michaels.
link.title: Lindsay Lohan Begged Lorne Michaels for SNL Spot

link.Abstract: "[Partying is] not my thing anymore," Lohan told host Matt Lauer in an interview airing Thursday.
link.title: Lindsay Lohan Claims She's Done Partying

link.Abstract: According to TMZ, Lindsay Lohan is giving Saturday Night Live free reign this weekend.
link.title: Lindsay Lohan Says Nothing is Off-Limits for SNL

link.Abstract: Lindsay Lohan’s latest court visit proved the actress is meeting the terms of her probation. According to the judge, she’s “in the home stretch” of her sentence.
link.title: Lindsay Lohan Passes Probation Hearing, in ‘Home Stretch’ of Probation

link.Abstract: While attending an amfAR gala in New York, Lindsay Lohan asked a "Canadian financier" to buy her a $20,000 watch. He laughed her request off, according to reports.
link.title: Lindsay Lohan Acts Like Charity Case at amfAR Gala

link.Abstract: According to a lawsuit, Lindsay Lohan allegedly drove a rented Maserati into a woman pushing a stroller.

entry.title: Jay-Z SXSW Livestream Starts Tonight

link.Abstract: If you can access YouTube, you can watch Jay-Z's SXSW set Monday night. The show starts at 8 p.m. ET.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: If you can access YouTube, you can watch Jay-Z's SXSW set Monday night. The show starts at 8 p.m. ET.
link.title: Jay-Z SXSW

link.Abstract: Kanye West and a who's who including Jay-Z and Kid Cudi landed at the South By Southwest Festival March 19 for VEVO Presents: G.O.O.D. Music. Some 3,000 people reportedly packed into the city's former power plant for the show -- and we've got pictures.
link.title: Photos: Kanye West, Jay-Z Rock SXSW

link.Abstract: Jay-Z and Kanye West wrapped their Watch the Throne tour in Vancouver Dec. 17 and 18. For the final concert's closing number, they performed the single "N*ggas in Paris" 11 times. Crazy. In that spirit, here are 11 of the best photos from Vancouver. We invite you to spend approx. 40 minutes flipping through them.
link.title: The 11 Best Photos From Watch the Throne's Final Show

link.Abstract: Those aren't her eyes, 'Ye. Kanye West, Jay-Z and Nicki Minaj performed at the 2011 Victoria's Secret Fashion Show, airing Nov. 29 on CBS. We've got photos.
link.title: Photos: Kanye West, Jay-Z and Nicki Minaj at the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show

link.Abstract: Watch "N***as in Paris," Kanye West and Jay-Z's latest video, directed by Kanye West.

link.Abstract: Listen: Jay-Z's Song For Blue
link.title: Listen: Jay-Z's Song For Blue

link.Abstract: Beyonce and Jay-Z's baby daughter, Blue Ivy Carter, is the youngest person to appear on a Billboard chart.
link.title: Beyonce and Jay-Z's Baby Blue Makes Billboard History, Causes World to Question What They've Done with Their Lives

link.Abstract: Kanye West and Jay-Z's first Watch the Throne music video is here. Watch "Otis," directed by Spike Jonze.
link.title: Watch Kanye West and Jay-Z (And Aziz Ansari?) Chop Up a Maybach In 'Otis'

link.Abstract: If only Jay-Z had quit using the word "bitch" before writing "99 Problems." No worries. We've got a few suggestions for re-writes.
link.title: Jay-Z's Got 99 Problems, and the B-Word's One

link.Abstract: Montreal was watching Kanye West and Jay-Z Nov. 22 when the two MCs brought their Watch the Throne tour to the Bell Centre. We've got photos. The Watch the Throne tour continues to Vancouver Dec. 17 and 18.
link.title: Photos: Watch The Throne in Montreal

entry.title: Demi Lovato Says She Still Struggles With Bulimia, Cutting

link.Abstract: "I cannot tell you that I have not thrown up since treatment," Lovato said in an MTV special. "I cannot tell you that I have not cut myself since treatment. I'm not perfect. This is a daily battle that I will face the rest of my life."
